#Monterey Bay Zostera leaves; data from 1998 through 2000		
#
#Reflectance (FRACTION INCIDENT FLUX)is grand mean of all clean leaves of all ages	
#
#Absorption coefficient (NATURAL LOG) is grand mean of all clean leaves.
#
#See file "Monterey Bay iop data from 97 and 98.xls" for details		
#
